CODIF_DATA.TY_TYPE_BID: Submission for one or more lots

ML_TI_DOC.TI_CY: Dik li kienet ir-Repubblika Jugoslava tal-Maċedonja

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Reagents, materials, calibrators for hemostasis applicative for automated coagulometer BSC-XP or the equivalent and maintaining devices for automated coagulometer BCS-XP or the equivalent.

LOCATION.P: Pho Institute of Transfusion Medicine of Republic of Macedonia — Skopje, located at Vodnjanska 17 St., Skopje.

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Part 1 Reagents and calibrators for the basic hemostasis tests and coagulation factors applicative for automated coagulometer BCS-XP or the equivalent.
Part 2 Reagents and calibrators tracking fibrinolysis application for automated koagulometar BCS-XP or the equivalent.
Part 3 Reagents and calibrators for monitoring the activity of inhibitors of hemostasis applicative for automated coagulometar BCS-XP or equivalent.
Part 4 Dilution buffer coagulation tests compatible for BCS XP or equivalent.
Part 5 Rotor cells with 20 segmented cells that have 6 dilution chambers compatible for BCS XP or equivalents.
Part 6 Solution for cleaning of BCS XP analyzer compatible for BCS XP or equivalent.
Part 7 Solution for washing the BCS XP system, compatible for BCS XP or the equivalent.
Part 8 Disinfectants for BCS XP System compatible for BCS XP or the equivalent.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Reagents and calibrators for the basic hemostasis tests and coagulation factors applicative for automated coagulometer BCS-XP or the equivalent.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: 1. Reagent for determining prothrombin time, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 40 000
2. Reagent for calibration of prothrombin time in INR and %, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 60
3. Reagent for determining the active partial thromboplastin time, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 8.000
4. Reagent for determining the active partial thromboplastin time in human citrated plasma,compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 4 000
5. Reagent for determining the thrombin time in human citrated plasma, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 13 500
6. Reagent for determining the batroxombin time, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 20
7. Reagent for determining the endogenous thrombin reagents, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 5
8. Calcium chlorid, CaCl2,compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 15 000

9. Reagent for determining the precision and analytic deviation of certain analytes: Prothromin time, Active Partial time, Thrombin time, Batroxombin, Fibinogen, Coagulation Factors, Inhibitors, Complementary activity, Plasminogen, Protein C, Lupus Anticoagulant compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent. ml 1 500

10. Reagent for calibration of Prothrombin time, Fibrinogen, Coagulation factors, Von Willebrand, Inhibitors, total complementary activity and Plasminogen, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 400
11. Reagent for quantitative determination of fibrinogen in the plasma,compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 750
12. Reagent for preparation of fibrinogen reference curve by Claus method, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 60
13. Reagent for determining the activity of coagulation factor 2 in the plasma, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 45
14. Reagent for determining the activity of coagulation factor 5, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 120
15. Reagent for determining the activity of coagulation factor 7, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 45
16. Reagent for determining the activity of coagulation factor 8 in human plasma, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 240
17. Reagent for determining the activity of coagulation factor 8 in human plasma with homogeneuous method, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 20
18. Reagent for determining the activity of coagulation factor 9 in human plasma compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 160
19. Reagent for determining the activity of coagulation factor 10, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 15
20. Reagent for determining the activity of coagulation factor 11 in human plasma compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent, ml 45
21. Reagent for determining the activity of coagulation factor 12 in the human plasma, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 45
22. Reagent for determining the activity of coagulation factor 13 in human plasma, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 150
23. Reagent for determining the activity of Ristocetin cofactor of Von Willebrand factor in human plasma through platelet compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 800
24. Reagent for determining the activity of Ristocetin cofactor of Von Willebrand factor in human plasma by binding Glycoprotein 1b, compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 30
25. Reagent for immunoturbidimetric quantitative determination of Von Willebrand External Antigen Factor in the human plasma плазма compatible for BCS-XP or the equivalent ml 160.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Reagents and calibrators tracking fibrinolysis application for automated koagulometar BCS-XP or the equivalent.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: 1 Reagent for the quantitative immunoturbidimetric determination of D-dimer in human plasmacompatible for BCS XP or the equivalent ml 3 600
2 Reagent for control for assessment and analytical comparison of normal and pathological values in the determination of D-dimer in human plasma, compatible for BCS XP or the equivalent ml 40

3 Reagents for rapid qualitative or semi quantitative evaluation of circulating derivatives of cross-linked fibrin degradation products in human plasma,Compatible for BCS XP or the equivalent test 9 000
4 Reagent for the quantitative determination of biological activity of plasminogen compatible for BCS XP or the equivalent ml 45
5 Reagent for the determination of the activity of plasminogen activator inhibitor in human plasma compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 60
6 Reagent for the quantitative determination of biological activity of the alpha 2 antiplasmin compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 30.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Part -3 Reagents and calibrators for monitoring the activity of inhibitors of hemostasis applicative for automated coagulometar BCS-XP or equivalent.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: 1 Reagent for the quantitative determination of the activity of protein C,compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 360
2 Reagent for resistance screening of activated protein C in plasma in individuals with a genetic defect in Factor 5 (Leiden) compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 100
3 Reagent for the determination of the functional activity of protein S in plasma compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 160
4 Reagent for the quantitative determination of the activity of antithrombin III in plasma compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 1.080
5 Reagent for the determination of heparin activity in plasma monitoring heparin therapy compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 180
6 Low level of control for quantitative determination of unfractionated heparin compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 6
7 A high level of control for quantitative determination of unfractionated heparin compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 6
8 Low-level of control for the quantitative determination of heparin with low molecular weight,compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 6
9 High level of control for the quantitative determination of heparin with low molecular weight,compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 6
10 Reagent for calibration of unfractionated heparin compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 12
11 Reagent for calibration of the low molecular weight heparin, compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 12
12 Reagent for screening of the lupus anticoagulant, compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 400
13 Reagent validation of lupus anticoagulant compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 150
14 Reagent for checking the functional capacity of the entire complementary system (complement-1 Complement 3 and Complement 4) compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 25.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Part 4 Dilution buffer coagulation tests compatible for BCS XP or equivalent.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: 1 The dilution buffer for coagulation tests compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 1 500.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Part-5 Rotor cells with 20 segmented cells that have 6 dilution chambers compatible for BCS XP or equivalents.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: 1 Rotor cells 20 with segmented cells that have 6 dilution chambers compatible for BCS XP or equivalents piece 12 600.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Part 6- Solution for cleaning of BCS XP analyzer compatible for BCS XP or equivalent.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: 1 Solution for cleaning the BCS XP analyser, compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 300.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Part 7-Solution for washing the BCS XP system, compatible for BCS XP or the equivalent.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: 1 Solution for washing the BCS XP System,compatible apparatus BCS XP or equivalent ml 6 750.

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Part 8 Disinfectants for BCS XP System compatible for BCS XP or the equivalent.

TOTAL_QUANTITY_OR_SCOPE.P: 1 Disinfectant for BCS XP System compatible for BCS XP or equivalent ml 6 000.

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Guarantee for quality execution of the contract: A condition for signing a contract with the most favourable economic operator is to provide a bank guarantee by the tenderer who is selected as the most favourable as
well as for implementation of the contract in a quality manner in amount of 5 % of the value of the contract, VAT excluded.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — Document for registered activity — DRD Form, issued by the Central Registry or relevant document issued by a competent authority in the country where the tenderer is registered, and

— Valid Decision on performing wholesale of medical devices issued by the Ministry of Health of the Republic of Macedonia, or an equivalent document issued by a competent authority in the country where the bidder is registered

— a statement by the economic operator that it has not been imposed a legally valid court decision for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering for the last 5 years;
— a certificate by a competent authority that a bankruptcy procedure has not been initiated;
— a certificate by a competent authority that a liquidation procedure has not been initiated;
— a certificate by a competent authority from the country where that economic operator is registered for paid taxes, contributions and other public duties;

— a certificate by the Register of sentences for committed crimes of legal entities that a secondary sentence prohibition on participation in open call procedures, awarding public procurement contracts and contracts for
public private partnership, has not been imposed,
— a certificate by the Register of sentences for committed crimes of legal entities that a secondary sentence temporary or permanent prohibition on performing a certain activity

— a certificate that a misdemeanour sanction resulting in prohibition for practising profession, performing activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing a particular activity has not been imposed by a legally valid court decision.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — The procurement subject — reagents are approved to be released on the market on the territory of the Republic of Macedonia according to the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — Decision on registration of medical devices — reagents in the Registry of Medical Devices available in RM or Temporary approval, i.e. or a Final Approval for parallel import of medical device, in accordance with Articles 131 and 131-a of the Law on Medicines and Medical Devices.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: Additional information about electronic auction: All qualified contractors will be informed and invited for e-auction.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: Pho Institute of Transfusion Medicine of The Republic Of Macedonia Skopje, located on Vodnjanska 17 St.,Skopje — Meeting Hall

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Additional information about authorised persons and opening procedure: Any person with authorisation letter
